original_text: Then Jesus finished the story and he said, ‘You must forgive your friends completely. If you do not agree to forgive them, then my Father in heaven will do like that king did. He will not forgive you.’
korean_text: 너희가 각각 마음으로부터 형제를 용서하지 아니하면 나의 하늘 아버지께서도 너희에게 이와 같이 하시리라

sentences.original_text: You must forgive your friends completely
If you do not agree to forgive them
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 너희가 그들을 용서하기로 동의하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: will do like that king did
sentences.korean_translation: 그 왕이 한 것처럼 하실 것이다
